item.description:
ABL has a special for August. $50 for three beginers series of classes (August Only).

This is great way to learn a new dance (or brush up on the basics) and to meet other dancers..

No partner necessary. Classes rotate partners.

Mon: 7:00pm - 8:00pm Waltz (Beg) STARTS 8/01
Tue: 7:00pm - 8:00pm Salsa (Beg) STARTS 8/02
Wed: 7:00pm - 8:00pm Cha Cha (Beg) STARTS 8/03

group.name: Salsa, Swing, Latin & Ballroom Dancers of Metro Worcester

item.name: Beginner Waltz Series
